name: PolyCore Defense
description:
PolyCore Defense is a classic tower defense game that is all about the right decisions. In order to succeed you need to pick the right turrets and place them at the most optimal locations. Upgrade your turrets with modules to destroy your enemies faster and counter their abilities. The maps increase in difficulty with shorter and increased number of paths. Can you beat them all?


Use your imagination to build an effective line of defense against waves of enemies with increasing difficulty. Pick and place turrets from your arsenal. Upgrade turrets with modules that enhance them with unique effects. Activate abilities in clutch situations or when you need a little defensive boost.




Destroy enemies to earn XP and unlock turrets, upgrade modules, perks and abilities. Complete maps to unlock the next one. If you are up for a challenge, try to complete a map without The Core losing any health in order to Ace it. Ace them all for the ultimate challenge!




  • Strategic gameplay
  • Lots of unique turrets
  • Loads of modules to upgrade turrets in unique ways
  • Unlockable abilities
  • Leveling system
  • Endless mode, how long will you last?
  • Perks for long term progression
  • Various enemies with different effects
  • Steam Achievements
  • Challenging maps
  • Complete maps without losing any health to ace them for increased challenge
